metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Emergence has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Emergence has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Dorian, A Minor,  and B Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
